articles.author: , The Des Moines Register
articles.title: Marshalltown's The Flying Elbow is Iowa's best pulled pork sandwich - Des Moines Register
articles.description: The Marshalltown restaurant also won a best burger accolade in 2022.
articles.content:
Social media has spoken. Iowa has a new reigning champion for the best pulled pork sandwich in the state.
The Flying Elbow in Marshalltown took home the honors, besting restaurants across the state … [+2527 chars]
